name: places/ChIJffHJJhD2wokRgXUXZja-6lE
formattedAddress: 40 W 116th St, New York, NY 10026, USA
adrFormatAddress: 40 W 116th St, New York, NY 10026, USA

originalText.text: I am very disappointed with Kalahari and the bracelet key system has been a total headache. It could be the mistake of the person who checked us in but anyway I'm very upset with Kalahari. The bracelet key didn't work as the room key so we had to line up and waited for long time again to get the new one and the person who assisted us to check in told us she put my room and the room of my friend as close as possible and we found out that we are in the different wings. My friend's room will be ready before mine because it is almost ready but they didn't get the text message until after 4pm, so they had to call to find out. I understand that it could take long to get the room ready but I was upset because it was different from what she promised. The biggest issue is that the new bracelet we've got or the staff at the towel exchange booth didn't work at all. We picked up 4 towels and returned all of them on the same day but we are charged with $150 for not returning the towels. The staff at the towel station didn't even count how many I returned before threw them into the bin and I even doubled checked with my room number because I couldn't trust if my bracelet was working correctly. The staff confirmed that I returned everything and now my invoice has $150 for the towels. I got the text saying I'm going to be charged $30 for the towel on the last day of my trip so I talked to the staff at the front desk about the issue and she promised that she will resolve the issue but now I'm charged even more. I spent so much time in the line for the front desk in order to resolve the issues that is made by the resort and my time is wasted since nothing has resolved. I am very upset with all the electronic system and check-in process. Now I'm back at home and trying to reach someone at the resort but no one picks up the phone. I'm not going to recommend Kalahari to anyone.

originalText.text: My  5 stars is strickly honoring the resident manager n all of his staff, ONLY..They are the best. most helpful n caring. We live here but board president n some others not nice and prople caring at all. Atitude problem. Resident  Glen n wife are nasty attitude. I had problems more than once. Glenn even stopped my washer, took my clothes out wet n had even my dish cloth on floor I had to throw away. They have no remorse, n arrogant. Week ago he also came to my door n took cart while we were unloading a shipment, n I went to door, he had taken cart instead of going down stairs to get another which there were 2 more. When I brought the one I had upstairs. I left 2 more. I have had it with him n his arrogant self so have other residents. The nice Cocierge on desk defused confrontation by quietly getting me another cart to bring rest of my shipment upstairs.

originalText.text: Considering moving here. Can anyone living here tell me how the maintenance payments have been? Have they been stead or risen a lot? What’s the board like?
